text: Atrivim Solomon kamaghɨn ofa gamir gumazim Abiatarɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ uamategh uan nguibam Anatotɨn mangɨ uan nguazimɨn ikɨ. Nɨ osɨmtɨzim iti, ezɨ kɨ nɨ mɨsueghan koghtɨ nɨ aremeghan kogham. Kɨ fo, nɨ fomɨra nan afeziam Devit ko ikegha, Ikiavɨra Itir God, en Ekiamɨn Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavimɨn Boksiam gisaghpu. Ezɨ Devit osɨmtɨzir avɨriba aterima, nɨ a ko ikia uaghan da ateri. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ nɨ mɨsueghan koghtɨ, nɨ aremeghan kogham.”
